description: This file defines a TypeScript class 'TemplateService' that provides an interface for various template-related operations such as fetching, creating, updating, deleting, rendering, validating, and cloning templates, as well as managing test cases and variables via API calls.

classes.name: TemplateService
classes.description: A service class that encapsulates API calls related to template management, including CRUD operations, rendering, validation, testing, cloning, importing/exporting, and variable management.

methods.name: getTemplates
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of templates with optional search filtering.

methods.name: getTemplate
methods.description: Retrieves a specific template by its ID.

methods.name: createTemplate
methods.description: Creates a new template with provided data.

methods.name: updateTemplate
methods.description: Updates an existing template identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: deleteTemplate
methods.description: Deletes a template by its ID.

methods.name: renderTemplate
methods.description: Renders a template with specified variables.

methods.name: validateTemplate
methods.description: Validates the syntax of a template.

methods.name: testTemplate
methods.description: Runs a specific test case on a template.

methods.name: runAllTests
methods.description: Executes all test cases associated with a template.

methods.name: getTemplatesByDevice
methods.description: Retrieves templates filtered by device type.

methods.name: cloneTemplate
methods.description: Clones an existing template with a new name.

methods.name: exportTemplate
methods.description: Exports a template as a downloadable file.

methods.name: importTemplate
methods.description: Imports a template from a file.

methods.name: getTemplateVariables
methods.description: Fetches variables defined within a specific template.

methods.name: addTestCase
methods.description: Adds a new test case to a template.

methods.name: updateTestCase
methods.description: Updates an existing test case within a template.

methods.name: deleteTestCase
methods.description: Deletes a test case from a template.
